name: Continuum (itch) (notaloli39, ikeia, dreamvrchitect)
description:
Is it possible to break a continuum?

You wake up from an ever longing sleep greeted by a strange-looking wizard on a train, along the way you are directed to meet NPC's through exploring the train. Realizing having talked to certain characters you transpire under continuum.

■ Psychological thriller stimulating game-play

Go across six train carts to explore its stories.

■ Beguile character atmosphere

With each cart, you will come along NPC's with tales you may acknowledge to.

■ Average playtime: 1 hour 30 minuites
